argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_2cshwid | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) = W ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) = W ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> W = ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) = ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) cyclShift N ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cshwcl | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( W cyclShift M ) e. Word V ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift M ) e. Word V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_lencl | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. NN0 ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_nn0zd | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. ZZ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_zsubcl | |- ( ( ( # ` W ) e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( # ` W ) - M ) e. ZZ ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( # ` W ) - M ) e. ZZ ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( # ` W ) - M ) e. ZZ ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 13 |  | #P_2cshwcom | |- ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) e. Word V /\ ( ( # ` W ) - M ) e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) cyclShift N ) = ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 11, 12, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) cyclShift N ) = ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) ) |
| 15 | 4, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift N ) = ( ( ( W cyclShift M ) cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - M ) ) ) |
